conbody.p: The Properties view pane is located at the bottom of the interface and displays attributes related to the diagram element that you selected in the Editor area. For some files and elements, the Properties view pane contains multiple tabs (for example, General tab, Technical tab, Action tab) that show different types of information related to the selected item. Because your role might not require you to access certain information, some tabs are disabled and you will not have access to them. You can add or modify the information in the Properties view pane at any time.
Tip To enlarge the Properties view pane, use the divider bars to resize the area.
